text: walmnafqwn aladhin banawa msjdana; mdart lilmuminin wkfrana biallah wtfryqana bayn almwmnyn, lysly fih bedhm wytrk masjid (qba') aladhi yusaliy fih almslmwn, fykhtlf almuslimun wytfrqu bsbb dhlk, wantzara liman harab allah warasulah min qabl -whw 'abu eamir alrahb alfasq- liakun mkanana llkyd llmslmyn, wlyhlfnn hwla' almunafiqun 'anahum ma 'araduu bbnayh 'iilaa alkhayr walrfq balmslmyn waltwset ealaa aldueafa' aleajzyn ean alsayr 'iilaa masjid (qba'), wallah yashhad 'iinahum lakadhibun fima yahlifun elyh. waqad hudim almasjid w'uhriq
